seed: YOUR 12 OR 24 WORD SEED PHRASE GOES HERE

_instructions.description: This file contains your BIP39 seed phrase for wallet auditing
_instructions.format: Replace the seed value above with your actual 12 or 24 word mnemonic phrase
_instructions.example_12_words: word1 word2 word3 word4 word5 word6 word7 word8 word9 word10 word11 word12
security_notes: ⚠️  NEVER share this file or commit it to version control
⚠️  This seed phrase gives full access to your wallets
⚠️  The tool will only use it locally for read-only address derivation
⚠️  You will be prompted to confirm before the seed is used
_instructions.validation: The tool will validate that your seed phrase is a valid BIP39 mnemonic before use
